<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Notes">Notes</span></h2>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist reflist-upper-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-total-3"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-total_3-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/City_of_London" title="City of London">City of London</a> and <a href="/wiki/Greater_London" title="Greater London">Greater London</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-12"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-12">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">See also: <a href="/wiki/Independent_city#National_capitals" title="Independent city">Independent city § National capitals</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-17"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-17">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">The Greater London Authority consists of the <a href="/wiki/Mayor_of_London" title="Mayor of London">Mayor of London</a> and the <a href="/wiki/London_Assembly" title="London Assembly">London Assembly</a>. The London Mayor is distinguished from the <a href="/wiki/Lord_Mayor_of_London" title="Lord Mayor of London">Lord Mayor of London</a>, who heads the <a href="/wiki/City_of_London_Corporation" title="City of London Corporation">City of London Corporation</a> running the <a href="/wiki/City_of_London" title="City of London">City of London</a>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-35"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-35">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">According to the <a href="/wiki/Eurostat" title="Eurostat">European Statistical Agency</a> (Eurostat), London had the largest <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Larger_Urban_Zones" title="Larger Urban Zones">Larger Urban Zone</a> in the EU. Eurostat uses the sum of the populations of the contiguous urban core and the surrounding commuting zone as its definition.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-157"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-157">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">London is not a city in the usual UK sense of having <a href="/wiki/City_status_in_the_United_Kingdom" title="City status in the United Kingdom">city status</a> granted by the Crown.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-172"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-172">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">According to the <i>Collins English Dictionary</i> definition of 'the seat of government',<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-169"><a href="#cite_note-169">[164]</a></sup> London is not the capital of England, as England does not have its own government. According to the <i>Oxford English Reference Dictionary<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-170"><a href="#cite_note-170">[165]</a></sup></i> definition of 'the most important town' and many other authorities.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-171"><a href="#cite_note-171">[166]</a></sup></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-417"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-417">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Imperial College London was a constituent college of the University of London between 1908 and 2007. Degrees during this time were awarded by the federal university; however, the college now issues its own degrees.</span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

</li>
<li id="cite_note-9"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-9">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFSub-national_HDI">Sub-national HDI. <a class="external text" href="https://hdi.globaldatalab.org/areadata/shdi/" rel="nofollow">"Area Database – Global Data Lab"</a>. <i>hdi.globaldatalab.org</i>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=hdi.globaldatalab.org&amp;rft.atitle=Area+Database+%E2%80%93+Global+Data+Lab&amp;rft.au=Sub-national+HDI&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fhdi.globaldatalab.org%2Fareadata%2Fshdi%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALondon"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-10"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-10">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.ons.gov.uk/peoplepopulationandcommunity/populationandmigration/populationestimates/datasets/populationestimatesforukenglandandwalesscotlandandnorthernireland" rel="nofollow">"ons.gov.uk"</a>. <i>Office for National Statistics</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-london_001-11"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-london_001_11-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20080322235536/http://www.museumoflondon.org.uk/English/EventsExhibitions/Permanent/RomanLondon.htm" rel="nofollow">"Roman London"</a>. <a href="/wiki/Museum_of_London" title="Museum of London">Museum of London</a>. n.d. <li id="cite_note-13"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-13">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFFowler2013">Fowler, Joshua (5 July 2013). <a class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-23518687" rel="nofollow">"London Government Act: Essex, Kent, Surrey and Middlesex 50 years on"</a>. <i>BBC News</i>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=BBC+News&amp;rft.atitle=London+Government+Act%3A+Essex%2C+Kent%2C+Surrey+and+Middlesex+50+years+on&amp;rft.date=2013-07-05&amp;rft.aulast=Fowler&amp;rft.aufirst=Joshua&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bbc.co.uk%2Fnews%2Fuk-england-23518687&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALondon"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-Mills2-14"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Mills2_14-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFMills2010">Mills, AD (2010). <i>Dictionary of London Place Names</i>. <a href="/wiki/Oxford_University_Press" title="Oxford University Press">Oxford University Press</a>. p. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=UWKcAQAAQBAJ&amp;pg=PA152" rel="nofollow">152</a>. <q>Of course until relatively recent times the name London referred only to the City of London with even <i>Westminster</i> remaining a separate entity. But when the County of London was created in 1888, the name often came to be rather loosely used for this much larger area, which was also sometimes referred to as <i>Greater London</i> from about this date. However, in 1965 <b>Greater London</b> was newly defined as a much enlarged area.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Dictionary+of+London+Place+Names&amp;rft.pages=152&amp;rft.pub=Oxford+University+Press&amp;rft.date=2010&amp;rft.aulast=Mills&amp;rft.aufirst=AD&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALondon"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-auto-43"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-auto_43-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-auto_43-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFBynon2016">Bynon, Theodora (2016). </li>
<li id="cite_note-45"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-45">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFSchrijver2014">Schrijver, Peter (2014). <i>Language Contact and the Origins of the Germanic Languages</i>. <li id="cite_note-london_016-62"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-london_016_62-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFTinniswood"><a href="/wiki/Adrian_Tinniswood" title="Adrian Tinniswood">Tinniswood, Adrian</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.co.uk/history/british/architecture_02.shtml" rel="nofollow">"A History of British Architecture — White Tower"</a>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-78"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-78">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFDoolittle2014">Doolittle, Ian (2014). <li id="cite_note-93"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-93">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFHarris2012">Harris, Rhian (5 October 2012). <a class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.co.uk/history/british/victorians/foundling_01.shtml" rel="nofollow">"History – The Foundling Hospital"</a>. <a href="/wiki/BBC" title="BBC">BBC</a><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-london_040-162"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-london_040_162-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFDilys2000">Dilys, M Hill (2000). <a class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/urbanpolicypolit0000hill/page/268" rel="nofollow"><i>Urban Policy and Politics in Britain</i></a>. <li id="cite_note-london_041-163"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-london_041_163-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20080527193714/http://www.london.gov.uk/assembly/reports/plansd/london_regional_200104.pdf" rel="nofollow">"London in its Regional Setting"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. London Assembly. Archived from <a class="external text" href="http://www.london.gov.uk/assembly/reports/plansd/london_regional_200104.pdf" rel="nofollow">the original</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span> on 27 May 2008<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">6 June</span> 2008</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=London+in+its+Regional+Setting&amp;rft.pub=London+Assembly&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.london.gov.uk%2Fassembly%2Freports%2Fplansd%2Flondon_regional_200104.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALondon"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-198"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-198">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.weatheronline.co.uk/reports/philip-eden/Longest-drought-for-2-years.htm" rel="nofollow">"Philip Eden: Longest drought for 2 years – weatheronline.co.uk"</a>. <i>weatheronline.co.uk</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-london_072-216"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-london_072_216-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFDoganKasarda1988">Dogan, Mattei; Kasarda, John D. <li id="cite_note-london_073-217"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-london_073_217-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20080106051217/http://www.london.gov.uk/london-life/business-and-jobs/financial-centre.jsp" rel="nofollow">"London as a financial centre"</a>. <li id="cite_note-london_075-218"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-london_075_218-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1"><a class="external text" href="http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/entertainment/1608619.stm" rel="nofollow">"West End still drawing crowds"</a>. <i>BBC News</i>. 22 October 2001. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20110511121403/http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/entertainment/1608619.stm" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> from the original on 11 May 2011<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-facts-355"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-facts_355-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20070529041317/http://www.tfl.gov.uk/corporate/modesoftransport/londonunderground/1608.aspx" rel="nofollow">"Key facts"</a>. <li id="cite_note-HESA_citation-413"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-HESA_citation_413-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Combined total from <link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.hesa.ac.uk/data-and-analysis/students/where-study" rel="nofollow">"Where do HE students study?"</a>. <a href="/wiki/Higher_Education_Statistics_Agency" title="Higher Education Statistics Agency">Higher Education Statistics Agency</a><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">1 March</span> 2020</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Where+do+HE+students+study%3F&amp;rft.pub=Higher+Education+Statistics+Agency&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hesa.ac.uk%2Fdata-and-analysis%2Fstudents%2Fwhere-study&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALondon"></span>Included institutions are <a href="/wiki/Birkbeck,_University_of_London" title="Birkbeck, University of London">Birkbeck</a>, <a href="/wiki/Royal_Central_School_of_Speech_and_Drama" title="Royal Central School of Speech and Drama">Royal Central School of Speech and Drama</a>, <a href="/wiki/City,_University_of_London" title="City, University of London">City, University of London</a>, <a <li id="cite_note-428"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-428">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20031219084151/http://www.london.gov.uk/mayor/economic_unit/spending_time.jsp" rel="nofollow">"Mayor of London – Spending Time: Londons Leisure Economy"</a>. <i>london.gov.uk</i>. <li id="cite_note-504"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-504">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20080829192523/http://www.kew.org/ksheets/pdfs/k16kewhistory.pdf" rel="nofollow">"Kew, History &amp; Heritage"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <a href="/wiki/Royal_Botanic_Gardens,_Kew" title="Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew">Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew</a>. <li id="cite_note-525"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-525">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFClarey2008">Clarey, Christopher (7 May 2008). <a class="external text" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2008/07/05/sports/tennis/05wimbledon.html" rel="nofollow">"Traditional Final: It's Nadal and Federer"</a>. <i>The New York Times</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. </li>
<li id="cite_note-526"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-526">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation encyclopaedia cs1 cs1-prop-long-vol" id="CITEREFWill_Kaufman_&amp;_Heidi_Slettedahl_Macpherson2005">Will Kaufman &amp; Heidi Slettedahl Macpherson, ed. (2005). "Tennis". <i>Britain and the Americas</i>. Vol. 1 : Culture, Politics, and History. ABC-CLIO. p. 958. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-1-85109-431-8" title="Special:BookSources/978-1-85109-431-8"><bdi>978-1-85109-431-8</bdi></a>. <q>this first tennis championship, which later evolved into the Wimbledon Tournament ... continues as the world's most prestigious event.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=bookitem&amp;rft.atitle=Tennis&amp;rft.btitle=Britain+and+the+Americas&amp;rft.pages=958&amp;rft.pub=ABC-CLIO&amp;rft.date=2005&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-85109-431-8&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALondon"></span></span>

class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Olympic_Summer_Games_Host_Cities" title="Template:Olympic Summer Games Host Cities"><abbr style=";;background:none Olympic Games">Summer Olympic Games</a> <a href="/wiki/List_of_Olympic_Games_host_cities" title="List of Olympic Games host cities">host cities</a></div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd <ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/1896_Summer_Olympics" title="1896 Summer Olympics">1896</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Greece" title="Greece"><img alt="Greece" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="800" data-file-width="1200" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6e/Flag_of_Greece_%281822-1978%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Greece_%281822-1978%29.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6e/Flag_of_Greece_%281822-1978%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Greece_%281822-1978%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6e/Flag_of_Greece_%281822-1978%29.svg/45px-Flag_of_Greece_%281822-1978%29.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Athens" title="Athens">Athens</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1900_Summer_Olympics" title="1900 Summer Olympics">1900</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/France" title="France"><img alt="France" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bc/Flag_of_France_%281794%E2%80%931815%2C_1830%E2%80%931974%2C_2020%E2%80%93present%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_France_%281794%E2%80%931815%2C_1830%E2%80%931974%2C_2020%E2%80%93present%29.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bc/Flag_of_France_%281794%E2%80%931815%2C_1830%E2%80%931974%2C_2020%E2%80%93present%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_France_%281794%E2%80%931815%2C_1830%E2%80%931974%2C_2020%E2%80%93present%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bc/Flag_of_France_%281794%E2%80%931815%2C_1830%E2%80%931974%2C_2020%E2%80%93present%29.svg/45px-Flag_of_France_%281794%E2%80%931815%2C_1830%E2%80%931974%2C_2020%E2%80%93present%29.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Paris" title="Paris">Paris</a></li>

<li><b><a href="/wiki/1952_Summer_Olympics" title="1952 Summer Olympics">1952</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Finland" title="Finland"><img alt="Finland" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="1100" data-file-width="1800" decoding="async" height="14" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bc/Flag_of_Finland.svg/23px-Flag_of_Finland.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bc/Flag_of_Finland.svg/35px-Flag_of_Finland.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bc/Flag_of_Finland.svg/46px-Flag_of_Finland.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Helsinki" title="Helsinki">Helsinki</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1956_Summer_Olympics" title="1956 Summer Olympics">1956</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Australia" title="Australia"><img alt="Australia" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="640" data-file-width="1280" decoding="async" height="12" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Melbourne" title="Melbourne">Melbourne</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1960_Summer_Olympics" title="1960 Summer Olympics">1960</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Italy" title="Italy"><img alt="Italy" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="1000" data-file-width="1500" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/23px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/35px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/45px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Rome" title="Rome">Rome</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1964_Summer_Olympics" title="1964 Summer Olympics">1964</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Japan" title="Japan"><img alt="Japan" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="700" data-file-width="1000" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1b/Flag_of_Japan_%281870%E2%80%931999%29.svg/22px-Flag_of_Japan_%281870%E2%80%931999%29.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1b/Flag_of_Japan_%281870%E2%80%931999%29.svg/33px-Flag_of_Japan_%281870%E2%80%931999%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1b/Flag_of_Japan_%281870%E2%80%931999%29.svg/43px-Flag_of_Japan_%281870%E2%80%931999%29.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Tokyo" title="Tokyo">Tokyo</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1968_Summer_Olympics" title="1968 Summer Olympics">1968</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Mexico" title="Mexico"><img alt="Mexico" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="560" data-file-width="980" decoding="async" height="13" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/23px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/35px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/46px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Mexico_City" title="Mexico City">Mexico City</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1972_Summer_Olympics" title="1972 Summer Olympics">1972</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/West_Germany" title="West Germany"><img alt="West Germany" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="1000" decoding="async" height="14" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/23px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/35px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/46px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Munich" title="Munich">Munich</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1976_Summer_Olympics" title="1976 Summer Olympics">1976</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Canada" title="Canada"><img alt="Canada" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="1200" decoding="async" height="12" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d9/Flag_of_Canada_%28Pantone%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Canada_%28Pantone%29.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d9/Flag_of_Canada_%28Pantone%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Canada_%28Pantone%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d9/Flag_of_Canada_%28Pantone%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Canada_%28Pantone%29.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Montreal" title="Montreal">Montreal</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1980_Summer_Olympics" title="1980 Summer Olympics">1980</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Soviet_Union" title="Soviet Union"><img alt="Soviet Union" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="1200" decoding="async" height="12" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg/46px-Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Moscow" title="Moscow">Moscow</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1984_Summer_Olympics" title="1984 Summer Olympics">1984</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/United_States" title="United States"><img alt="United States" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="650" data-file-width="1235" decoding="async" height="12" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/46px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> Los Angeles</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1988_Summer_Olympics" title="1988 Summer Olympics">1988</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/South_Korea" title="South Korea"><img alt="South Korea" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_South_Korea_%281984%E2%80%931997%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_South_Korea_%281984%E2%80%931997%29.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_South_Korea_%281984%E2%80%931997%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_South_Korea_%281984%E2%80%931997%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_South_Korea_%281984%E2%80%931997%29.svg/45px-Flag_of_South_Korea_%281984%E2%80%931997%29.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Seoul" title="Seoul">Seoul</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1992_Summer_Olympics" title="1992 Summer Olympics">1992</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Spain" title="Spain"><img alt="Spain" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="500" data-file-width="750" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Spain.svg/23px-Flag_of_Spain.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Spain.svg/35px-Flag_of_Spain.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Spain.svg/45px-Flag_of_Spain.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Barcelona" title="Barcelona">Barcelona</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1996_Summer_Olympics" title="1996 Summer Olympics">1996</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/United_States" title="United States"><img alt="United States" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="650" data-file-width="1235" decoding="async" height="12" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/46px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Atlanta" title="Atlanta">Atlanta</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/2000_Summer_Olympics" title="2000 Summer Olympics">2000</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Australia" title="Australia"><img alt="Australia" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="640" data-file-width="1280" decoding="async" height="12" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Sydney" title="Sydney">Sydney</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/2004_Summer_Olympics" title="2004 Summer Olympics">2004</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Greece" title="Greece"><img alt="Greece" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="400" data-file-width="600" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Greece.svg/23px-Flag_of_Greece.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Greece.svg/35px-Flag_of_Greece.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Greece.svg/45px-Flag_of_Greece.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> Athens</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/2008_Summer_Olympics" title="2008 Summer Olympics">2008</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/China" title="China"><img alt="China" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/45px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Beijing" title="Beijing">Beijing</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/2012_Summer_Olympics" title="2012 Summer Olympics">2012</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/United_Kingdom" title="United Kingdom"><img alt="United Kingdom" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="1200" decoding="async" height="12" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/ae/Flag_of_the_United_Kingdom.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_United_Kingdom.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/ae/Flag_of_the_United_Kingdom.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_United_Kingdom.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/ae/Flag_of_the_United_Kingdom.svg/46px-Flag_of_the_United_Kingdom.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> London</li>

<li><b><a href="/wiki/2020_Summer_Olympics" title="2020 Summer Olympics">2020</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Japan" title="Japan"><img alt="Japan" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/9e/Flag_of_Japan.svg/23px-Flag_of_Japan.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/9e/Flag_of_Japan.svg/35px-Flag_of_Japan.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/9e/Flag_of_Japan.svg/45px-Flag_of_Japan.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> Tokyo<sup>[c3]</sup></li>
<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/2024_Summer_Olympics" title="2024 Summer Olympics">2024</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/France" title="France"><img alt="France" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/23px-Flag_of_France.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/35px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/45px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> Paris</i></li>

<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/2032_Summer_Olympics" title="2032 Summer Olympics">2032</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Australia" title="Australia"><img alt="Australia" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="640" data-file-width="1280" decoding="async" height="12" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Brisbane" title="Brisbane">Brisbane</a></i></li></ul>
